WSCp MARK 2.27 & he sæde him,
restedæg wæs geworht for þa men, næs se man for ðam restedæge.
WSCp MARK 2.28 Witodlice Drihten is mannes sunu eac swylce restedæges.
WSCp MARK 3.1 And eft he eode on gesamnunge
& þar wæs an man forscruncene hand hæbbende.
WSCp MARK 3.2 & hi gymdon hwæþer he on restedagum gehælde, þæt hi hine gewregdon?
WSCp MARK 3.3 Ða cwæð he to ðam men þe forscruncene hand hæfde,
aris gemang him.
WSCp MARK 3.4 Þa cwæð he
alyfð restedagum wel to donne hweþer ðe yfele, sawla gehælan, hweþer ðe forspillan;
& hi suwodon.
WSCp MARK 3.5 & hi besceawiende mid yrre ofer hyra heortan blindnesse geunret cwæð to þam men,
Aþene þine hand;
& he aþenede hi,
þa wearð his hand gehæled sona.
WSCp MARK 3.6 Þa Pharisei mid Herodianiscum utgangende þeahtedon ongen hine, hu hi hine fordon mihton.
WSCp MARK 3.7 & þa ferde se hælend to þære sæ mid his leorningcnihton,
& mycel menigeo him fyligde fram Galilea, & Iudea. WSCp MARK 3.8 & Hierusalem, & fram Iudea & begeondan Iordane,
& to him com mycel menegeo ymbe Tirum & Sidone gehyrende þa ðing þe he worhte.
WSCp MARK 3.9 & he cwæð to his cnihtum þæt hi him on scipe þenodon, for þære menigu þæt hi hine ne ofþrungon.
WSCp MARK 3.10 Soþlice manega he gehælde, swa þæt hi æthrinon his,
& swa fela swa untrumnessa. WSCp MARK 3.11 & unclæne gastas hæfdon; þa hi hine gesawon, hi toforan him astrehton, & þus cweðende clypedon,
þu eart Godes sunu.
WSCp MARK 3.12 & he him swyðe forbead, þæt hi hine ne geswutelodon.
WSCp MARK 3.13 & on anne munt he ferde & to him geclypode þa ðe he wolde
& hi to him comon.
WSCp MARK 3.14 & he dyde þæt hi twelfe mid him wæron,
& he hi asende godspell to bodigenne.
WSCp MARK 3.15 & he him anweald sealde untrumnessa to hælanne, & deofolseocnessa ut to adrifanne.
WSCp MARK 3.16 & he nemde Simon Petrum.

WSCp MARK 3.17 & Iacobum Zebedei, & Iohannem his broðor, & him naman onsette Boaneries, þæt is ðunres bearn. WSCp MARK 3.18 & Andream, & Philippum, & Bartholomeum & Thomam, & Iacobum Alphei, & Taddeum, & Simonem Chananeum. WSCp MARK 3.19 & Iudam Scarioth, se hine sealde.
WSCp MARK 3.20 & eft him to com swa micel menigu þæt hi næfdon hlaf to etanne.
WSCp MARK 3.21 & þa hi hine gehyrdon hi ferdon þæt hi hine namon & þus cwædon,
Soðlice he is on hatheortnesse gewend.
WSCp MARK 3.22 & þa boceras þe wendon fram Hierusalem cwædon,
Soþlice he hæfð Beelzebub
& on deofla ealdre he deofulseocnessa ut adrifð.
WSCp MARK 3.23 & he hi togædere geclypode & on bigspellum him to cwæð,
Hu mæg Satanas Satanan ut adrifan?
WSCp MARK 3.24 & gif his rice on him sylfum bið todæled, hu mæg hit standan?
WSCp MARK 3.25 & gif þæt hus ofer hit sylf ys todæled, hu mæg hit standan?
WSCp MARK 3.26 & gif Satanas winð ongen hine sylfne he bið todæled
& he standan ne mæg ac hæfð ende.
WSCp MARK 3.27 Ne mæg man þone strangan his æhta & his fatu bereafian & on his hus gan, buton man þone strangan ærest gebinde, & þonne his hus reafige.
WSCp MARK 3.28 Soðlice ic eow secge þæt ealle synna synd manna bearnum forgyfene, & bysmorunga þam ðe hi bysmeriað.
WSCp MARK 3.29 Soþlice ic eow secge,
se þe ðone halgan gast bysmerað, se næfð on ecnysse forgyfenesse, ac bið eces gyltes scyldig.
WSCp MARK 3.30 Forþam þe hi cwædon
he hæfð unclænne gast.
WSCp MARK 3.31 Þa com to him his modor & his gebroðra, & þarute stodon & to him sendon, & to him clypedon.
WSCp MARK 3.32 & mycel menigu ymb hine sæt and to him cwædon,
her is þin modor & þine gebroðra ute & secaþ þe.
WSCp MARK 3.33 He þa him andswarode & cwæð,
hwylc is min modor & mine gebroþru?
WSCp MARK 3.34 & he cwæþ ða behealdende þe him abuton sæton,
her is min modor & mine gebroðru.
WSCp MARK 3.35 Soðlice se ðe deþ Godes willan, se is min modor & min broðor & swustor.
WSCp MARK 4.1 & eft he ongan hi æt þære sæ læran,
& him wæs mycel menegu togegaderod, swa þæt he on scip eode, & on þære sæ wæs, & eall seo menegu ymbe þa sæ wæron on lande.
